ingredients.ingredient: 3 ½ pounds boneless pork shoulder roast, netted or tied
1 (10.5 ounce) can Campbell's® Condensed French Onion Soup
12 roll (blank)s round sandwich rolls or hamburger rolls, split

cookingTips: Sear pork shoulder in oil before slow cooking to build flavor and create crust
Shred pork into bite-sized pieces; it should pull apart easily when fully cooked
Keep sauce warm in slow cooker to prevent pork from drying out; serve immediately after shredding
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I know when the pork shoulder is fully cooked and ready to shred, and what's the best technique for pulling it apart?
